SELECT IDX , TITLE , HITCNT , DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATETIME, '%y/%m/%d') AS CREATE_DATETIME FROM board
WHERE INSTR(TITLE, #{searchText}) > 0
WHERE INSTR(CONTENTS, #{searchText}) > 0

ORDER BY IDX DESC
